title: Can Not login after bug and probably leavebustered due to bug
body: I finally waited out my long leavebusters after 4 hours and on my last leavebuster i went into a ranked game i then experienced the bug while loading into the game which forces you to press cancel and then reconnect. The client was still unable to reconnect after about 5 or 6 tries so i closed the client and tried to login and i have not been able to log in since then. Please help me riot

replies.body: Playing the required games applied by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is great, but it's really important to stay consistent to prevent it from happening again.  It sounds like you're still having some network issues staying connected to the game servers, and it's really crucial to get that fixed up and prevent further leaves.  To start, you should go over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to find and resolve whatever is causing that failure to connect.  Hope it helps!
